snippet: Mr. Griffin, who was ousted as chief executive of Time Inc. in 2011, will become the new head of Tribune Publishing in mid-April.
abstract: Tribune Company announces that Jack Griffin, who was ousted as chief executive of Time Inc in 2011, will become the new head of Tribune Publishing.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Griffin, who was ousted as chief executive of Time Inc. in 2011, will become the new head of Tribune Publishing in mid-April.

headline.main: Jack Griffin Appointed Chief of Tribune Publishing
headline.print_headline: Former Chief of Time Inc. to Be New Head of Tribune Publishing
